mapper.select: select a.level_id, a.score, c.level_name, a.evaluate, a.weight, b.employee_id, b.employee_name, a.status, a.create_time from `wk_hrm_achievement_employee_evaluato` a left join `wk_hrm_employee` b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id left join `wk_hrm_achievement_appraisal_score_level` c on a.level_id = c.level_id where a.employee_appraisal_id = #{employeeAppraisalId} and a.score is not null;
